page.title: 20The Beagles
page.content: When we went to Ecclesfield Church we decided to walk back to school over the fields.On our way back we saw the Ecclesfield Beagles Kennels.The dogs were making alot of noise.This summer (1985) 26 hounds were stolen from the kennels,it is believed that they were stolen by animal rights campaigners.The 26 dogs were valued at Â£800 and each has the letters EB tattoed on its left ear and a number on its right ear.Eleven dogs were left behind.The Eccesfield Beagles Hunt begins in October.Ten Couples are needed for the hunt.
